definition: to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk

sentences.english: His coach Sun Haiping said he was worried about the great pressure on Liu Xiang at this time.
sentences.chinese: 教练孙海平对刘翔此次所承受的压力表示担心。

sentences.english: We went to see Coach, and she showed us how to collect sap too.
sentences.chinese: 我们去看教练，然后她也告诉了我们怎样采集糖树汁。

sentences.english: Volunteer to coach or assistant coach a kids sports team.
sentences.chinese: 志愿去做孩子们的运动队教练，或是教练助理。

sentences.english: Volunteer to coach or assistant coach a kids sports team.
sentences.chinese: 志愿去做孩子们的运动队教练，或是教练助理。

sentences.english: Also Massimo Moratti has announced officially his new coach.
sentences.chinese: 莫拉蒂亲自官方宣布了他的新教练。

sentences.english: The coach substituted Smith for Jones.
sentences.chinese: 教练让史密斯上场，换下了钟斯。

sentences.english: The fact that you were den leader in your Cub Scouttroop is irrelevant.
sentences.chinese: 你在童子军做教练员就是无关的信息。

sentences.english: He is challenging for the coach in the Football Club.
sentences.chinese: 他正在竞选，争当足球俱乐部的教练。

sentences.english: Chris Hughton will be offered the opportunity to make a quick return to management with Sheffield United.
sentences.chinese: 谢非联为胡顿提供了一个快速上位的教练位子。

sentences.english: Van belonging to the large old-style coach.
sentences.chinese: 大范甘迪属于老派风格的主教练。

sentences.english: The coaches told me to dunk, but I would lay the ball in.
sentences.chinese: 教练要求我去灌篮，但我会把球轻轻的放进篮筐。

sentences.english: Yes, I know what your coach wants.
sentences.chinese: 是，我知道你的教练想怎么做。

sentences.english: Massage therapists and fitness trainers work fewer hours per week than any other professionals.
sentences.chinese: 按摩师和健身教练每周的工作时间比其他职业都要少。

sentences.english: But Li admitted that Fan was a capable coach.
sentences.chinese: 但李金生承认，范斌是个有能力的教练。

sentences.english: This article has designed training car's vice-steering system based on the electric power steering.
sentences.chinese: 设计了基于电动转向的教练车副转向系统。

sentences.english: We want a cook, a library assistant and a sports coach.
sentences.chinese: 我们想找一个厨师，一个图书馆助理和一名体育教练。

definition: to teach/to be a teacher/to train/to coach
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
foreign teacher (abbr. for 外國教師|外国教师)/greenhorn/novice/amateurish/religion other than Buddhism (term used by Buddhists)
sporting coach/military drill master (in Song times)
member of same class, team, work group etc/teammate
soccer association/soccer federation/abbr. for 足球協會|足球协会[zu2 qiu2 xie2 hui4]
